holidays.title: College Colors Day
holidays.description: By rocking your college colors and apparel, you show spirit and school pride.

holidays.title: Frankenstein Day
holidays.description: Can you believe it’s been over 200 years since the original “Frankenstein” story was published?

holidays.title: International Cabernet Sauvignon Day
holidays.description: Get your glasses and corkscrews ready as we celebrate one of the world’s best wines.

holidays.title: International Day of the Victims of Enforced Disappearances
holidays.description: Involuntary disappearances happen every day so use your voice to raise awareness of this global issue.

holidays.title: International Whale Shark Day
holidays.description: Let’s show giant displays of love and affection for the whale shark on August 30.

holidays.title: National Grief Awareness Day
holidays.description: This National Grief Awareness Day on August 30 is dedicated to raising awareness of the myriad ways in which individuals cope with loss. It offers…

holidays.title: National Holistic Pet Day
holidays.description: Care for your pet with the same generosity you give your own mind, body, and spirit.

holidays.title: National Toasted Marshmallow Day
holidays.description: Whip out your best marshmallow toasting skills and win over everyone at the party!

holidays.title: Popular Consultation Day
holidays.description: Let us learn about the importance of the decision of the Indonesian president regarding East Timor.

holidays.title: Santa Rosa De Lima
holidays.description: Get ready to learn about the life of Saint Rose of Lima today!

holidays.title: Santa Rosa De Lima
holidays.description: Peru celebrates Santa Rosa de Lima to honor Rose of Lima, the country’s patron saint.

holidays.title: Slinky Day
holidays.description: Today marks Slinky's 79th anniversary! Let's remember this much-loved retro toy today.

holidays.title: Turkey Victory Day
holidays.description: We are fostering national pride and learning more about history on Turkey Victory Day.

holidays.title: Brayden Ledford’s Birthday
holidays.description: All you need to know about the TikTok sensation Brayden Ledford is right here.

holidays.title: Cameron Diaz’s Birthday
holidays.description: Success was written in the stars for this celebrity, who’s won the hearts of many.

holidays.title: Cameron J. Wright’s Birthday
holidays.description: Although he’s just making inroads into acting, the world needs to sit up and take note.

holidays.title: Erin Napier’s Birthday
holidays.description: Driven by passion and excellence in all that she does, nothing can stop this home renovator.

holidays.title: Sarah Stevenson’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this YouTuber, her legacy is materializing one upload at a time.

holidays.title: T-Rex’s Birthday
holidays.description: T-Rex is a rap battle extraordinaire who has earned a name in the battle rap scene.

holidays.title: Tyler Funke’s Birthday
holidays.description: Incredibly funny and well-known TikTok star Tyler Funke is only getting more and more popular!

holidays.title: Warren Buffett’s Birthday
holidays.description: Today we celebrate this business magnate who continues to make waves in the business world.
